articles.title: Ford Honors Holman Moody With Special Heritage Edition GT - AutoJosh
articles.description: Ford GT has reached the end of its production life but it’s not going away without offering something special (probably limited) in the veil of the Holman Moody Heritage Edition. The American race team based in Charlotte, North Carolina, campaigned three GT40…
